column2: With some time, effort, and money invested, I think I can learn or improve my crafting.
I think it's time to apply what I have learned and see if I have improved.
I think enough time has passed, I can try to improve again if I want.
With some time, effort, and money invested, I think I can learn or improve my ability to heal those stricken by the ails of this world.
I think it's time to apply what I have learned and see if I have improved.
Enough time has passed, I can try to gather the materials I need to attempt to learn more if I want.
With some time, effort, and money invested, I think I can learn or improve my ability to compose poetry and songs and perhaps even my singing.
I think it's time to apply what I have learned and see if I have improved.
I have rested long enough, I can return to my studies now and learn more about song-writing if I so choose.
While peace is preferable, sometimes conflict comes in spite of all we do.  With some time, effort, and money invested, I am confident that I can learn to improve my skill in battle.
Learn to become a true Elven Warrior!
Learn to become a true Dwarven Warrior!
Ready to become a true Elven Warrior.
My teachers are ready and I am prepared, time to see if I can apply these techniques I have learned to a final test!
I have recovered from the last test, I can resume my studies if I so chose.
Ready to become a true Dwarven Warrior.
My teachers are ready and I am prepared, time to see if I can apply these techniques I have learned to a final test!
